entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
